name: Customizing Material color
description:
M3 makes brand expression in an interface simpler and more beautiful than ever before.

The previous Material You color lab explored how to visualize dynamic colors within design mockups, but you can also use Material theming to customize your app with your brand colors. Utilizing the new color system with your brand colors will create an accessible color scheme that is able to take on more dynamic features!


Material Theme Builder + Design Kit

Learn about how to utilize the Material Theme Builderâ€™s dynamic features and how it utilizes design tokens available in the new Material 3 Design Kit


Visit m3.material.io for more information about dynamic color.


Learn more about the Material Theme Builder material.io/material-theme-builder

Suggestions or feedback? Ping us @materialdesign on Twitter.
